part_description: Includes two buttons, a scroll wheel, and a smooth underside. Buttons are on top, scroll wheel in the center, and underside is flat.
internal_interaction_description: The buttons and scroll wheel interact with internal sensors to send signals. Pressure on buttons triggers switches, while the scroll wheel rotates on an axis to send scrolling commands.
external_interaction_description: Interacts with a computer via wireless connection. Users click buttons and scroll to navigate digital interfaces. The mouse moves smoothly on flat surfaces to control the cursor on the screen.
